title: Haaland Hammers Red Devils
description:
The FC Crew recap Manchester City's 6-3 win over Man United in the Manchester Derby and discuss Ten Hag's lineup decisions. Also, a look back at Liverpool's 3-3 draw against Brighton and Arsenals 3-1 win over Tottenham and what it all means for the top 4 race. Plus, Real Madrid drops points for the first time this season as they draw 1-1 against Osasuna.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
